::SnowCat::

She looks in the direction that the bot is facing.  She sees 
something move in the bushes.   She took a few steps then stopped.  
She sniffed that air. "It smell like the one on the ground, only a 
little different." She took a few steps and then ran for what was in 
the bushes. She stopped at teh edge of the clearing.  she spoke in a 
soft voice."Come here and make yourself known to me.  Who are you."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus takes out a scanner, walking toward DeathScythe. He looks 
down at the 
> scanner, looking up in several seconds.
> 
> "He's out cold," he says to SnowCat, "He's too big to bring with 
us, I think 
> we should leave him here."
> 
> Ramulus suddenly spins around, his scanners picking up another bot 
(Rattrap).
> 
> "We're not alone," he says, taking out his gun and walking slowly 
toward the 
> edge of the clearing.
